member.name: NMTVSTATEIMAGECHANGING
member.summary: Contains information about an NM_TVSTATEIMAGECHANGING notification code.

member.name: NMTVSTATEIMAGECHANGING.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification code.

member.name: NMTVSTATEIMAGECHANGING.hti
member.summary: Handle to the tree-view item whose state image is changing.

member.name: NMTVSTATEIMAGECHANGING.iOldStateImageIndex
member.summary: The index of the old state image.

member.name: NMTVSTATEIMAGECHANGING.iNewStateImageIndex
member.summary: The index of the new state image.
